about.me: IT Professionals with many years experience working with Enterprise and Government clients. Reliable, Secure and Carbon Neutral Stake Pool. As a new pool that has committed to the Cardano Foundation mission it makes sense that we also contribute to making the world a better place. A Drawn Arrow will donate one third of our margin rewards to charities. We will be posting proof of payment as screenshots on our website every time a donation is made. It will be made clear exactly how much is being donated and to which charities.
